title: I kinda get the meaning of the lyrics of the song, Paradise by Coldplay. What is the meaning of the video though? - Quora

response.answer_text: The lyrics can pretty much mean whatever you want them to mean.  Unless the authors have specifically stated what a song means, it is up for interpretation by the listener.   The video appears to be the *elephant* is breaking out of the prison of life and is searching for its Paradise.  When he sees the *elephants*, he feels he has found it - his place to belong.    Here is a link to the lyrics.  There are some comments towards the bottom that show the different things others have felt it means: http://songmeanings.com/songs/view/3530822107858881173/
